Package simu.model

Class CarDealerShop

java.lang.Object
simu.model.CarDealerShop
public class CarDealerShop extends Object
Manages the car dealership operations, including inventory, sales, and customer interactions.

  • Method Details

    • addCar

      public void addCar(Car vehicle)
      Adds a car to the car collection (gallery). Validates the car object before adding it.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The car to be added to the gallery.

    • addCarToSold

      public void addCarToSold(Car vehicle)
      Adds a car to the list of sold cars. Validates the car object before adding it.
      Parameters:
      vehicle - The car to be added to the sold list.

    • sellCar

      public void sellCar(String registerNumber)
      Sells a car by its register number. Removes the car from the gallery and adds it to the sold list.
      Parameters:
      registerNumber - The register number of the car to be sold.

    • generateUniqueRegisterNumber

      public static String generateUniqueRegisterNumber()
      Generates a unique register number for a car. Ensures that the generated number is not already taken.
      Returns:
      A unique register number.

    • setMeanCarSalesProbability

      public void setMeanCarSalesProbability()
      Sets the mean car sales probability based on the car collection. Calculates the average base probability of all cars in the collection.

    • createCar

      public void createCar(int amount, String carType, String fuelType, double meanPrice, double priceVariance)
      Creates a specified number of cars and adds them to the car collection. Configures each car based on its type, fuel type, price, and variance.
      Parameters:
      amount - The number of cars to create.
      carType - The type of the car (e.g., SUV, Sedan).
      fuelType - The type of fuel the car uses.
      meanPrice - The average price of the car.
      priceVariance - The variance in the price of the car.

    • createCar

      public void createCar(int amount, String carType, String fuelType, double meanPrice, double priceVariance, double basePrice)
      Creates a specified number of cars and adds them to the car collection. Configures each car based on its type, fuel type, price, variance, and base price.
      Parameters:
      amount - The number of cars to create.
      carType - The type of the car (e.g., SUV, Sedan).
      fuelType - The type of fuel the car uses.
      meanPrice - The average price of the car.
      priceVariance - The variance in the price of the car.
      basePrice - The base price of the car.
